title: 35 Graded 1-4.5, w. Matty, Young, Hindus, more--
author: dougscats

posts.post_title: 35 Graded 1-4.5, w. Matty, Young, Hindus, more--
posts.post_content:
Following is a list of the graded cards I have for sale or trade
Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] to see scans [No pm's, please; my box is usually full].
First to say he'll take it gets it.

I've priced most of the commons, and those prices are firm.  Others, I haven't yet figured. If you're interested, let me know and I'll give you a price. Buy a few and I'll knock off a few bucks.   

Add $3 flat-rate for first-class S/H with tracking, no matter how many. 
Ppff [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] [no messages on ppff, please].  Regular paypal, add 3%.  Checks okay.

T206's:

Arellanes, Piedmont, SGC 20, $20 [nice front, has bit of paper-loss on back],
Batch, Polar Bear, SGC 45,
Blackburne, Sweet Cap. SGC 30, $27
Bridwell, w. cap, Old Mill, PSA 4[MC]
Burchell, Piedmont, SGC 30, $27,
Clark, Columbus, Pied. SGC 30 [looks worse], $25,
H. Davis, SC SGC 30, $27, 
Doolan batting, Tolstoi, SGC 35--SOLD-
Easterly, Polar Bear, SGC 30, 
Egan, EPDG, SGC 40, $90 [sharp corners; name on top and bottom],--SOLD--
Engle, Piedmont, SGC 20 [VG front, spot of paper-loss on back], $18, 
Russ Ford, Sov. 460, SGC 30, $54,--SOLD--
Foster/SL, Piedmont, SGC 10 [has subtle pinhole next to mouth], $45--SOLD-
Freeman, SC SGC 20, $22, 
Groom, Piedmont, SGC 30, $28 
Hartsel, Piedmont, SGC 30, $28,
Hinchman, Piedmont, SGC 30, $26,
Howell, SC 460/30, SGC 45,
Fielder Jones, hands at hips, SGC 30, $28,
Killian portrait, Piedmont, SGC 30 [over-sized], $27,
Lake, StL, ball in hand, Pied. 460, SGC 30, $28,
Lundgren, Chicago [SP], Piedmont 150, PSA 2.5
Mathewson, portrait, Piedmont, PSA A/Altered [chemically?--looks like halo around Matty's head; back damage]
McGinley, Piedmont, SGC 20, $21,
O'Neil, SC 350/30, SGC 30, $27, 
Orth/SL Piedmont SGC 55, $175,
Owen, Piedmont SGC 20, $22,
Quillen, Piedmont, SGC A, $17 
Shaw, Piedmont SGC 20, $21,
Stahl, SC 350/30, SGC 10, $14 [has broken bottom right corner], 
Stovall, batting, SC 460/42 OP, SGC 30, $30
Willets, Piedmont, SGC 30, 
YOUNG, bare hand, SGC A, $180 [nearly skinned--75% paper-loss on back--probable reason for grade as it is full-size and does not at all look trimmed; pretty nice-looking front].--SOLD-

For Trade only [I prefer ungraded cards for my collection--uncommon backs, upgrades on hall-of-famers--Of course, I'll trade for the right graded cards as well]:

Marquard, hands at sides, RC, EPDG, SGC 20 [very nice Fair; F-G],
Violat, Hindu, SGC 20 [good Fair, clean back]
Sid Smith, Hindu, SGC 20

Sold on this thread:

Lundgren, Chicago [SP], Piedmont 150, PSA 2, $140,--SOLD--
Bliss, Piedmont, PSA 3[Mk--"JM" stamped-back],--SOLD--
Burchell, Polar Bear, PSA 20 [looks nicer], $27--SOLD--
Herzog, SC 350-460/30, PSA 2 [a beauty for the grade], $29,--SOLD--
Davy Jones, Det., Piedmont, PSA 2,  $28,--SOLD--
McIntyre, Brklyn-Chic,  Old Mill, PSA 1.5, $32,--SOLD--
Leifield, Old Mill, PSA 1.5, $32,--SOLD--

New additions include:

Breitenstein, SL, OM, PSA 2,
A.O. Jordan, SL, Piedmont, SGC 20,
McCauley, Piedmont, SL, BVG 2 [has 518 written in pencil on back],
Young, bare hand, SGC A [Why the A, I'm not sure: Doesn't look trimmed,   
  but about 3/4 of back is skinned/paper-loss.  Pretty nice front].

Thanks Nic, Chris, Kell, Greg, and Chris N.

Update, with bundled prices--

Many sold; thanks Tom, Eric, Brendan, Greg.
SGC 10 Foster, new.
Lajoie and a few others sold.  Burchell, PB, added.
Can I please get a price on the Christy? Thank you
